nodes.text: A Human malewas a member of House Organa, a noble house of the planet Alderaan, and served as lord of his house sometime well before the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire. The lord had at least three younger brothers, and when his third brother's son Nomar exhibited Force-sensitivity at a young age, the lord gave his nephew to the Jedi Order as a gift.
Nomar Organa's uncle was first mentioned in Nomar's entry in the Codex for Star Wars: The Old Republic, a video game released by BioWare and LucasArts in 2011.
